trans-unit.source: Derivative of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that is the base class for all activities that contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: 衍生<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>也就是所有包含其他活動之活動的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: A CompositeActivity is responsible for managing the execution of its child activities.
trans-unit.target: CompositeActivity 負責管理其子活動的執行。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A CompositeActivity manages the execution of its child activities using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext> class methods and events defined on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]CompositeActivity 管理其子活動使用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext>類別方法和事件<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>類別</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>上定義</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext>的執行

trans-unit.source: For example, a child activity is scheduled for execution using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.ExecuteActivity%2A> of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，子活動會排定<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.ExecuteActivity%2A>的<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.ExecuteActivity%2A>使用的執行

trans-unit.source: A CompositeActivity activity can be notified when a child activity completes its execution by subscribing to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed> event defined on <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: 子活動完成執行，藉由<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>定義於<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>事件</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>訂閱時，就可以通知 CompositeActivity 活動

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime enforces certain constraints on CompositeActivity execution, the most fundamental of which is that a CompositeActivity activity cannot move to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed> state if any child activities are still in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Canceling>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Compensating>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Faulting>, state.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段強制執行特定的條件約束，CompositeActivity 執行時，最基本的是 CompositeActivity 活動無法移到<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>狀態的任何子活動是否仍在<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing>， <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Canceling>， <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Compensating>，或<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Faulting>，狀態。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Faulting> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Compensating> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Canceling> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> class from an <xref:System.Object> which implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface with type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref>類別從<xref:System.Object>實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面與型別<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface with type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面與型別<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> class, along with the name for that activity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref>類別，以及該活動的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name for the instance.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: name is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: name為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object representing the collection, <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref>, of all child activities.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，表示集合中， <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"> </xref>，所有子活動。

trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of child activities managed by the composite activity.
trans-unit.target: 代表由複合活動管理的子活動集合。

trans-unit.source: This collection can be updated.
trans-unit.target: 此集合可更新。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref> of all child activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref>所有的子活動。

trans-unit.source: Applies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"></xref> manifest in the parameter to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 適用於<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"></xref>資訊清單中的參數，這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"> </xref>套用。

trans-unit.source: workflowChanges is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: workflowChanges為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value which controls whether the individual activities within <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值控制是否內的個別活動<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>可以進行修改。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the individual activities within <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> can be modified; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果內的個別活動<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>可以將修改過，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: Calls <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Dispose*> on this instance, and optionally calls <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Dispose*> on all child activities of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<> *> 上這個執行個體，並選擇性地呼叫<> *> 上的這個執行個體的所有子活動。

trans-unit.source: Throughout an activity's lifetime, several .NET objects may be created or disposed.
trans-unit.target: 在整個活動的存留期，可能會建立或處置數個.NET 物件。

trans-unit.source: Every time a workflow instance is unloaded from memory, the .NET objects corresponding to the activities in the workflow tree are disposed (the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Dispose%2A> method is called on each activity).
trans-unit.target: 每次從記憶體卸載工作流程執行個體時，.NET 物件會處置對應到工作流程樹狀結構中的活動 (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Dispose%2A>方法會在每個活動呼叫)。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is loaded back into memory, a new .NET object is created for each activity with the state from the corresponding unload.
trans-unit.target: 當工作流程執行個體載入回記憶體中時，新的.NET 物件會建立為每個活動來自對應的卸載狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources used by this instance and all child activities of this instance; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only the unmanaged resources of this instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>釋放這個執行個體和所有子活動，這個執行個體所使用的 managed 和 unmanaged 資源<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源的這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the read-only collection that represents the subset of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> that are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得唯讀集合，代表子集<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>已啟用。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: The read-only collection that represents the subset of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> that are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀集合，代表子集<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>已啟用。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains all of the currently executing instances of the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列，其中包含所有目前正在執行指定之活動的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An array of activity instances that are currently executing.
trans-unit.target: 目前正在執行的活動執行個體的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Called when an exception is raised within the context of the execution of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的執行內容中引發例外狀況時呼叫。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref>這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that caused this fault.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>造成此錯誤。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> that results from an attempt to cancel this instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> ，這樣會產生從嘗試取消這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: exception is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: exception為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes all appropriate child activities of this instance and the specified <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化這個執行個體和指定<xref:System.IServiceProvider>.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>所有適當的子活動

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine every time the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this activity is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 由工作流程執行階段引擎呼叫每次<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>的載入此活動。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>實作<xref:System.IServiceProvider>，並提供與這個執行個體的服務。</xref:System.IServiceProvider> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine every time the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this activity is unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 由工作流程執行階段引擎呼叫每次<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>此活動為卸載。

trans-unit.source: Performs additional processing when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 執行額外的處理時<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> broadcast by the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref>廣播事件。

trans-unit.source: Event that occurs before a change being made to the underlying <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>.
trans-unit.target: 對基礎<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>變更之前，就會發生的事件

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EventArgs> relating to the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>與事件相關的。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called after changes have been made to the collection <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 對集合進行變更後呼叫<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>這個執行個體。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides processing for this event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，提供處理這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref>與這個執行個體相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine when an activity transitions into the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> state from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: 當活動轉換至由工作流程執行階段引擎呼叫<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref>狀態從<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref>狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method is used for activity cleanup, such as clearing dependency properties and deleting queues.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於清除活動，例如清除相依性屬性與刪除佇列。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> and provides services to this instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>實作<xref:System.IServiceProvider>，並提供與這個執行個體的服務。</xref:System.IServiceProvider> </xref:System.Object>
